headline: How Strengthening Analyst Optimism and Upward Estimate Revisions Will Impact Quanta Services (PWR) Investors
summary: In recent days, analyst sentiment for Quanta Services has strengthened, with expectations of significant earnings and revenue growth driven by upward estimate revisions and a strong earnings surprise record. This has positioned Quanta Services at the top of the Construction sector in terms of analyst outlook, highlighting its reputation as a top growth pick with a positive growth score and Zacks Rank endorsement. We’ll explore how analysts’ recent optimism and expectations of further...
